EmailTemplate.subject: Youâ€™re confirmed for the Pivotal Washington D.C. Grand Opening Event Thursday, May 18, 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Washington D.C. Grand Opening. See event details below.
Date: Thursday, May 18, 2017
Time: 6:30PM to 9:30PM Location: Pivotal Washington, DC. Address: 1625 I St NW, Suite 601, Washington, DC 20006 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps?q=1625+Eye+St+NW,+Suite+601,+Washington,+DC+20006&ion=1&espv=2&bav=on.2,or.r_cp.&bvm=bv.152180690,d.cGc&biw=1248&bih=608&dpr=1&um=1&ie=UTF-8&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjq_KOL_KHTAhVQ8mMKHSz4CAYQ_AUIBigB]]>)
Questions? Please contact Peter Schmitt via email at pschmitt@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pschmitt@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website <[[https://pivotal.io/events?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-dc-grand-opening-q217]]>.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[https://pivotal.io/event/washington-dc-grand-opening?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-dc-grand-opening-q217]]>
